alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calcasieu Parish through 630 PM CDT... At 556 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carlyss, or near Sulphur, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sulphur, Vinton, Carlyss, and Edgerly. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 8 and 27. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
